all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Be faithful unto the end, and lo, I am with you. These words are not of man nor of men, but of me, even Jesus Christ, your Redeemer, by the will of the Father. Amen.
Doctrine and Covenants 31:13
Quote of the Day
"We must heed the Savior’s call to build higher and holier relationships with all of God’s children."
David L. Buckner | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
